title: AI Anime Video Generator
subtitle: Turn text prompts, images, or OC into 5–15s anime videos

introduce.tagline: AI anime video generator on AnividAI | Text, image, and OC-driven anime storytelling.
introduce.title: Why AnividAI's AI Anime Video Generator Empowers Creative Animation
introduce.description: AnividAI's AI anime video generator offers three powerful ways to create anime videos: describe your scene with text prompts, upload reference images for image-to-video generation, or use your original characters (OC) from OC Maker. Our ai anime video generator supports multiple generation modes—text-to-video for pure imagination, image-to-video for visual references, and OC-to-video for character-driven stories. With professional-quality output from models like Veo3, Kling, Wan, and Sora, this free ai anime video generator is accessible for hobbyists and studios alike. You can remix prompts, palettes, and pacing, while the AI anime video generator keeps your vision consistent.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our AI Anime Video Generator?

how_to_use.title: Master the AI Anime Video Generator in 4 Steps
how_to_use.subtitle: Follow this OC-first workflow to keep every render intentional. Each step in the AI anime video generator mirrors the AnividAI product stack—credits stay visible, membership perks unlock pro controls, and camera logic syncs with prompts so you can storyboard, revise, and ship anime episodes without switching tools.
how_to_use.step_1_description: Draft a vivid prompt or use our example; the AI anime video generator parses genre, pacing, mood, and OC metadata so your first preview matches your intended emotional beat.
how_to_use.step_2_description: Choose an existing OC or upload a reference; the AI anime video generator syncs bios, outfits, and colors so every shot reflects established canon.
how_to_use.step_3_description: Set duration, ratio, resolution, motion, and style; tooltips keep credit use visible while the AI anime video generator predicts how each toggle affects pacing and render time.
how_to_use.step_4_description: Hit Generate to stream timelines in seconds, then download HD masters or share links; the AI anime video generator stores settings for instant reruns or future Shorts workflows.

showcase.title: Explore Video Examples
showcase.subtitle: See what our AI anime video generator can create. Explore stunning ai generated video examples from our ai anime video generator platform. Click any example to try the same style.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI anime video generator

items.question: What generation modes are supported?
items.answer: The AI anime video generator supports three modes: Text-to-Video (create videos from text descriptions), Image-to-Video (animate uploaded images or use first/last frame transitions), and OC-to-Video (generate videos featuring your original characters from OC Maker).

items.question: How long does video generation take?
items.answer: Most videos are generated in 1-5 minutes, depending on the model, duration, resolution, and prompt complexity. Fast models like Veo3 Fast complete quicker, while standard models may take longer for higher quality output.

items.question: What resolutions and aspect ratios are supported?
items.answer: Available options vary by model. Common resolutions include 720p and 1080p. Aspect ratios include 16:9 (landscape), 9:16 (portrait), and 1:1 (square). Note: 1080p is typically only available in 16:9 format. Please check the actual options when selecting your model.

items.question: Can I upload a reference image?
items.answer: Yes! You can upload 1-3 reference images depending on the model and mode. Some models support first-and-last-frame generation (2 images for transition effects), while others use a single reference image. The AI anime video generator uses these to maintain visual consistency.

items.question: How do I use my OC to generate videos?
items.answer: Create your OC in OC Maker, then select it in the AI anime video generator. The AI will feature your character's portrait as a reference image, maintaining character consistency in the generated anime video.

items.question: What are the video duration options?
items.answer: Duration options vary by model: typically 5, 10, or 15 seconds. Shorter videos use fewer credits and generate faster. Please refer to the actual model selection for available durations.

items.question: How do I download generated videos?
items.answer: After generation, click the download button below the video player. Videos are downloaded in your selected resolution. Plus and Pro members can remove watermarks before downloading.

items.question: How are credits calculated for videos?
items.answer: Credit costs vary significantly by model, resolution, and duration. Examples: Veo3 Fast ~100 credits, Veo3 Standard ~750 credits, Kling 5s ~210 credits, Wan 720p 5s ~300 credits. Always check the credit cost displayed on the generate button before creating—it reflects your actual selections.

items.question: What video models are available?
items.answer: We offer multiple AI video models including Veo3 (fast and standard), Kling v2.5, Wan 2.5, and Sora 2 (standard and pro). Each model has different strengths—some excel at motion quality, others at character consistency. The actual available models may vary.

parameters.title: Video Parameters
parameters.multi_shot_switch_hint: Create multiple shots of the same video.
parameters.sound_description: Enable model-generated sound for this video.
parameters.negative_prompt_placeholder: Words or concepts to avoid in the video

reference.label: Reference
reference.title: Reference Image
reference.drag-drop: Drag & drop image here or click to select
reference.error-auth: Please log in to upload images
reference.disabled-oc-selected: Current model supports only one image. OC portrait is already selected, so reference image upload is disabled.
reference.cleared-by-oc: Reference image cleared because OC was selected and current model supports only one image.
reference.trimmed-by-limit: Some reference images were removed to match current model limits.
reference.start-end-hint: Image #1 is Start Frame, Image #2 is End Frame.
reference.multi-shots-first-frame-only: Multi-shots is enabled. Only the first frame image will be used.
reference.end-frame-disabled-multi-shot: End frame is disabled in multi-shot mode.

errors.not-authenticated: Please log in to access this video
errors.no-permission: You don't have permission to access this video
errors.auth-required: Please log in to access this video
errors.character-not-found: Character not found or you don't have access to it. Please select a character manually.
errors.invalid-character-uuid: Invalid character reference. Please select a character manually.
errors.character-load-error: Failed to load character. Please try again.
errors.invalid-reference-image-uuid: Invalid reference image. Please select an image manually.
errors.reference-image-load-error: Failed to load reference image. Please try again.
errors.multi-shot-min-segments: Multi-shot mode requires at least 1 prompt segment.
errors.multi-shot-duration-exceeded: Total multi-shot duration must be between 3 and 15 seconds.
errors.multi-shot-segment-duration-invalid: Each multi-shot segment duration must be between 3 and 12 seconds.
errors.multi-shot-start-frame-required: Multi-shot mode requires a start frame image.
errors.kling-duration-invalid: Kling 3.0 duration must be between 3 and 15 seconds.
errors.start-end-images-required: Start/End Frame mode requires exactly 2 reference images.
